name: Restaurant of Horror (SpinOff Short)
description:
In a rural town opened up a new restaurant. This restaurant became an instant hit for the locals, yet something strange and ominous has been lurking within these new kitchen walls. Locals have been disappearing and sometimes returning completely out of it, behaving in a 'zombie' like manner. You and your friends decide to check out this new place to see for yourself what it is all about... only to discover that you and your friends are trapped in a restaurant of horrors! Survive the night with your friends or become the demon chef's next special feast for his guests in this short interactive fiction. 

The player, you like trying out new things and exploring new places.

This is your cousin Alice, she likes fashion and staying up to trends.

This is your high school friend Garett, you both like games.

The head chef working at the newly built restaurant in your rural town. He has an ulterior motive and a dark secret.
